long_description: Run the GoPro HERO3/3+ composite cable from your HERO3 or HERO3+ camera (sold separately) to your TV for standard-definition preview and playback of your GoPro videos and still photos. Cable features mini USB end for the camera and RCA end for the TV.
short_description: Run the GoPro HERO3/3+ composite cable from your HERO3 or HERO3+ camera (sold separately) to your TV for standard-definition preview and playback of your GoPro videos and still photos.
